title: Package.json Updates for Free Services
description: Required dependencies for all free service alternatives

notification-service.description: Gmail SMTP, Twilio sandbox, Google APIs

external-integrations.description: Google Drive API and PDFKit for PDF generation

order-service.description: Invoice PDF generation with Supabase storage

install_commands: cd notification-service && npm install nodemailer twilio googleapis
cd external-integrations && npm install googleapis pdfkit blob-stream
cd order-service && npm install @supabase/supabase-js pdfkit blob-stream
replaced_services: Premium SMS APIs → Email-to-SMS + Twilio Trial (FREE)
AWS S3/Google Cloud Storage → Google Drive API (FREE)
Paid PDF APIs → PDFKit Open Source (FREE)
